mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.rec_ver AS "recVer", a.carrier_code AS "carrierCode", a.start_obj_code AS "startObjCode", a.start_obj_address AS "startObjAddress", a.end_obj_code AS "endObjCode", a.end_obj_address AS "endObjAddress", a.audit_status AS "auditStatus", a.mileage AS "mileage", a.org_id AS "orgId"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tm_obj_route( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, rec_ver, carrier_code, start_obj_code, start_obj_address, end_obj_code, end_obj_address, audit_status, mileage, org_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{recVer}, #{carrierCode}, #{startObjCode}, #{startObjAddress}, #{endObjCode}, #{endObjAddress}, #{auditStatus}, #{mileage}, #{orgId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tm_obj_route SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, rec_ver = rec_ver + 1, carrier_code = #{carrierCode}, start_obj_code = #{startObjCode}, start_obj_address = #{startObjAddress}, end_obj_code = #{endObjCode}, end_obj_address = #{endObjAddress}, audit_status = #{auditStatus}, mileage = #{mileage}, org_id = #{orgId} WHERE id = #{id} AND rec_ver = #{recVer}
mapper.select:
SELECT ttoc.transport_obj_name AS "carrierName", ttos.transport_obj_name AS "startObjName", ttoe.transport_obj_name AS "endObjName",
FROM tm_obj_route a LEFT JOIN tm_transport_obj ttoc ON a.carrier_code = ttoc.transport_obj_code AND a.org_id = ttoc.org_id LEFT JOIN tm_transport_obj ttos ON a.start_obj_code = ttos.transport_obj_code AND a.org_id = ttos.org_id LEFT JOIN tm_transport_obj ttoe ON a.end_obj_code = ttoe.transport_obj_code AND a.org_id = ttoe.org_id WHERE a.id = #{id}
